subject: Baseball
Fenway Park (Boston)
lead_paragraph: Yankees gathered in the Fenway clubhouse to watch Goose Gossage’s induction speech, in which he stumped for George Steinbrenner to have a plaque at the Hall of Fame.
snippet: Yankees gathered in the Fenway clubhouse to watch Goose Gossage’s induction speech, in which he stumped for George Steinbrenner to have a plaque at the Hall of Fame.
